sourcesContent:
import './Weather.css' const Weather = (props) => { if (props.loading) return

loading

let temp, icon, description, humidity, speed if (props.type === 0) { temp = props.data.temp icon = props.data.weather[0].icon description = props.data.weather[0].description humidity = props.data.humidity speed = props.data.wind_speed }else{ temp = props.data.temp.day icon = props.data.weather[0].icon description = props.data.weather[0].description humidity = props.data.humidity speed = props.data.wind_speed // return

Hello World!!!

} return (

{`${temp}°C`}

{description}
{`Humidity: ${humidity}%`}
{`Wind speed: ${speed} km/h`}
) } export default Weather
